casebody.data:
BAPKO METAL FABRICATORS, INC., a California corporation, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. ITT HARTFORD, a corporation; Hartford Insurance Company of the Midwest, a corporation, Defendants-Ap-pellees. No. 00-55755. D.C. No. CV-99-00812-GLT. United States Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. Submitted Oct. 11, 2001 *. Decided Oct. 15, 2001.

Before BRUNETTI, RYMER, and WARDLAW, Circuit Judges.

The panel unanimously finds this case suitable for decision without oral argument. See Fed. R.App. P. 34(a)(2).

MEMORANDUM **

We affirm for the reasons set forth in the district court’s order granting summary judgment.

AFFIRMED.

This disposition is not appropriate for publication and may not be cited to or by the courts of this circuit except as provided by 9 th Cir. R. 36-3.
